Ann,
 
All I can say is hold on and get ready for the ride of a life time!=

 
Bruce
Bruce Halliday 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: lisby@earthlink=
.netDate: Mon, 28 Jan 2008 12:38:04 -0500Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New file up=
loaded to EVP-ITC




I thought it might have said that, too, but when I li=
sten to it with the noise-canceling headphones in the TwistedWave program, =
and even now, I'm still hearing "We're in heaven." I guess we have to go wi=
th the possibility that it's either. But it is still there, and you hear it=
. Phew. 

Your theory is quite possible. I've been getting both Seven and H=
eaven. Both are welcome! I guess we'll see how it all plays out. God, this =
is fascinating.

Ann



On Jan 28, 2008, at 10:51 AM, bruce halliday wrote:=





Hi Ann,I reviewed your file and this is what I heard on the first run.=
 "we're seven"  The fact that you had to slow the recording by 80% brings u=
p a few questions. I have been looking into 7as it pertains to ITC-EVP comm=
unication and what I find I believeI have already mentioned. Is when the am=
azing communication of the 80's and 90's was takingplace in Luxembourg and =
with researchers like mark Macy and that era of communication. The 7 repres=
ented themselves as angelic beings from a much higher spiritual level than =
we are used tocommunicating with.My guess is that they have begun to commun=
icate with us and are trying to evaluate the workings ofour present day tec=
hnology. I believe they led you to slowing the recording so as to discover =
the message hidden within.It could be the message was buried in the recordi=
ng to test our ability and ambition to look and listen further.Or the commu=
nication they send from a higher plane of spirituality utilizes certain rad=
io frequencies that need to be listened to in a certain way. In any event I=
'm sure they will continue to become more apparent and make themselves more=
 known to us when they are ready.I am not suggesting you slow all your reco=
rdings to that extent and sift through them with a fine tooth comb, that wo=
uld take a ridiculousamount of time and effort. When they need you to hear =
a message or receive a communication , they will make sure you do.Just like=
 this time. This is just a theory I have but that is what I heard immediate=
ly when I played the file. Bruce
Bruce Halliday 


From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroup=

t: [EVP-ITC] New file uploaded to EVP-ITC


Hello,This email message is a n=
otification to let you know thata file has been uploaded to the Files area =
of the EVP-ITC group.File : /Ann's files/wereinheaven012608.mp3 Uploaded by=
 : lisbyfarrum <lisby@...> Description : And not one minute from =
all the swearing, I get this: "We're in heaven." This file is slowed by mor=
e than 80 percent. You can't even hear it at regular speed. Amazing. You ca=
n access this file at the URL:http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/A=
nn%27s%20files/wereinheaven012608.mp3 To learn more about file sharing for =
your group, please visit:http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/m=
embers/web/index.htmlfilesRegards,lisbyfarrum <lisby@...>
